message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item that's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $10500?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $13000. This is a compromise that should work for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $10250. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your budget, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, which is still a good deal for both of us. I'm not willing to go lower than that, as it's my minimum price. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit away from my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. Can we make a deal at this price?
